rows.label: tlk70000049_04_msg001
rows.name:
When I first heard that His Majesty had
lain with an ordinary farming lass while
out on a campaign, it came as a shock...

rows.label: tlk70000049_04_msg002
rows.name:
But nowadays, it seems to me that
precious few people think much of
that scandal.

rows.label: tlk70000049_04_msg003
rows.name:
Because you grew up amongst the
common folk, Prince Adel, you have
a humility rare among the noble class.

rows.label: tlk70000049_04_msg004
rows.name:
The ease with which you relate to the
populace is a great boon, drawing
supporters from far and wide.

rows.label: tlk70000049_04_msg005
rows.name:
Though even I never dreamed you
would one day lead a united army of
soldiers from many different nations.

rows.label: tlk70000049_04_msg006
rows.name:
It is no small task to keep such a
diverse group of soldiers in check,
I can assure you of that much.

rows.label: tlk70000049_04_msg007
rows.name:
How did it come to this? I was only
hired to be the Prince's manservant...

rows.label: tlk70000049_04_msg008
rows.name:
Somehow that led to my looking after
Aletta in your absence, and lately I find
myself attending to the militia itself!

rows.label: tlk70000049_04_msg009
rows.name:
Sometimes I almost forget what my
actual job is supposed to be...
